title: How to Make Your Curls Last All Day | Beauty Extra | HSN
description:
Eli Vincent is sharing how to make your curls last all day long. Use a flexible hold hairspray in your hair. Then with your curling iron, start in the middle of the section of your hair instead of at the top or bottom. 

Shop HSN Beauty: https://www.hsn.com/shop/beauty/bs
